md:
giải nghĩa từ "dodged" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Dodged: ( Verb )
	+ Meaning: to avoid something by moving quickly to one side
	+ Example: She dodged the ball that was thrown at her.
	+ Related words: avoid, evade, sidestep

* Dodged: ( Past tense of dodge )
	+ Meaning: to have avoided something by moving quickly to one side
	+ Example: He dodged the question by changing the subject.
	+ Related words: avoided, evaded, sidestepped

* Dodged: ( Past participle of dodge )
	+ Meaning: to have avoided something by moving quickly to one side
	+ Example: The car dodged the pedestrian on the sidewalk.
	+ Related words: avoided, evaded, sidestepped
html:

  • Dodged: ( Verb )

  • Dodged: ( Past tense of dodge )

    • Meaning: to have avoided something by moving quickly to one side
    • Example: He dodged the question by changing the subject.
    • Related words: avoided, evaded, sidestepped

  • Dodged: ( Past participle of dodge )

    • Example: The car dodged the pedestrian on the sidewalk.
    • Related words: avoided, evaded, sidestepped
